description:
In cool temps, versatile layers win every time. The Selimut Poncho is made of a windproof Silky Touch nylon with a DWR finish to shed light moisture. The incredibly warm 700 fill-power down is quilted to keep it streamlined. High collar and chevroned quilting add style points to an easy-on, easy-off piece.

  • Exterior fabric is windproof Silky Touch nylon with a DWR finish to resist light rain and snow
  • Fully insulated with warm 700-fill power duck down (80% down and 20% feather) that meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare
  • Zippered opening at neck for easy/on off. Removable leather zipper pulls add style
  • Insulated tall collar adds scarf-like warmth
  • Kangaroo-style zippered handwarmer pockets defrost frigid digits
  • Side openings with snaps, so you can open them when you want to vent a little heat and close them when you want to hang onto that heat
name: Indyeva Selimut Poncho
